      • getDie

        public Die getDie(int i)
        Getter for a die inside the bag
        Parameters:
        i - position of the die inside the bag
        Returns:
        an existing die inside the bag or null if the spot is empty

      • size

        public int size()
        Max value = MAX_SIZE
        Returns:
        the number of dice inside the bag

      • popDice

        public java.util.List<Die> popDice(int numberOfDice)
        Extract dice from the bag popping them out of content
        Parameters:
        numberOfDice - number of dice to be popped
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Dice w/ size <= numberOfDice
